verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Valio ny hatakay re,
Fanahy Masina ô
'Zay hery sady tokinay,
Sy fitahiana.
Mamelona fanahy.
Manala ahiahy.
Fohazy, tsilovy,
Arovinao 'zahay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Raha misy halemena
Nitondra fietrena,
Fanahy ô, midina
Hitondra aim-baovao,
Hanangana ny rava
Ity mpanomponao.
Ho tonga irakao re,
Fanahy ! avotinao.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Reseo ny hevitray 'zao,
Hanoa Anao indray.
Fa kely tsy mahomby,
Ampionao 'zahay.
Izany fahotana
'Zay manameloka
Kosehonao hiala
Fa aminay ny antranao.
